emuInput.TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mrs. Black wearing eyeglasses with chain, dark long sleeved dress trimmed with fringe, and diamond shaped brooch, seated in armchair holding open book, in domestic interior with part of another room showing, possibly dining room
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 7, 1946, page 9, reads: "In Town - Mrs. Harry Black of Philadelphia spent this week in Pittsburgh visiting her sister-in-law, Mrs. Elestine Mitchell and Mrs. Daisy Lampkin. A member of an old Philadelphia family, Mrs. Black was entertained delightfully during her Smoky City stay. - Harris photo."
